game.title: The Dragon's Hoard
game.objective: Defeat the dragon and claim its hoard of gold.
game.description: A fearsome dragon has been terrorizing the countryside, and its hoard of gold is said to be immense. The king has put out a call for heroes to slay the dragon and claim its treasure.
game.reward: The dragon's hoard of gold and the title of Dragon Slayer.

task.description: The dragon's lair is located in the mountains to the north. It is a dangerous journey, but the reward is worth the risk.
The dragon is a powerful creature, but you must defeat it to claim its hoard of gold.

task.objective: Claim the dragon's hoard of gold.
task.description: Once you have defeated the dragon, you can claim its hoard of gold. The gold is located in a chamber deep within the dragon's lair.
